comment:
* Build an instance of {@link CallAttributes}. In order to build a valid instance, a * {@link PhoneAccountHandle}, call direction, display name, and {@link Uri} address * are required. * *

* Note: Pass in the same {@link PhoneAccountHandle} that was used to register a * {@link PhoneAccount} with Telecom. see {@link TelecomManager#registerPhoneAccount}

methods.name: public Builder setCallType(@CallType int callType)
methods.comment:
* Sets the type of call; uses to indicate if a call is a video call or audio call.
         * @param callType The call type.
         * @return Builder

methods.name: public Builder setCallCapabilities(@CallCapability int callCapabilities)
methods.comment:
* Sets the capabilities of this call.  Use this to indicate whether your app supports
         * holding, streaming and call transfers.
         * @param callCapabilities Bitmask of call capabilities.
         * @return Builder

methods.name: public CallAttributes build()
methods.comment:
* Build an instance of {@link CallAttributes} based on the last values passed to the
         * setters or default values.
         *
         * @return an instance of {@link CallAttributes}

methods.name: private boolean isInRange(int floor, int ceiling, int value)
